Theme.name: Theme
Theme.description:
A theme represents the cones, the lens in which the Stories are being situated.
a themes has conectric cone, axis of tension, future Possibilities and Story lines

params.name: length
params.description: - legth the Theme will have in the 3Dworld

params.name: axis
params.description: - object.x name of the x axis  object.y name of the y axis

params.name: date
params.description: - year of where the distant future ends.
